name: Sales Call
description: Client/prospect conversations with needs and next steps

sections.title: Prospect/Client
sections.instruction: Only include company name and attendee names explicitly stated in the transcript. If company name not mentioned, write 'Unknown company'. Do not invent surnames - if only 'John' is mentioned, write 'John' not 'John Smith'

sections.title: Pain Points & Needs
sections.instruction: Only list problems or needs the prospect explicitly described in their own words. Do not infer problems from context or add industry-typical pain points that weren't mentioned

sections.title: Objections
sections.instruction: Only list concerns or objections the prospect explicitly raised. If no objections were voiced, return empty array []

sections.title: Interest Signals
sections.instruction: Only list positive signals explicitly expressed by the prospect (e.g., asking about pricing, requesting a demo). If no clear interest signals, return empty array []

sections.title: Next Steps
sections.instruction: Only include follow-ups that were explicitly agreed upon during the call. Use exact timeline phrases from the conversation (e.g., 'Thursday at 2pm', 'next week') - do not convert to specific dates like '2024-01-15'
